title: Diabolist
summaries: The Diabolist is a Hardmode enemy found in the post-Plantera Dungeon. It is most common in areas backed by Tiled Walls. These are identified by the related Faction Flag, the Diabolic Sigil.

Diabolists attack by firing blazing magic bolts that can travel through <linked>blocks</linked> at the player. These bolts explode, creating a large flaming sphere that lasts for 3.83 seconds and deals massive damage on contact. Both the bolts and the spheres inflict the <linked>On Fire!</linked> <linked>debuff</linked>. Diabolists teleport to a different location on-screen every time they are hit.
